original: 「若要懲宦官、除元凶，只要交付獄吏就足夠，何必召外兵？意圖誅滅所有宦官，此計必定敗露，我想這事必將失敗。」
text: 'If you want to punish the eunuchs and remove the culprit, it is enough to hand over to the jailer, why call outside soldiers? Intent to destroy all the eunuchs, this plan will definitely be exposed, I think this thing will fail.'
